summary: Implements a diffusion-based image generation pipeline that accepts English or Chinese text prompts, encodes them with bilingual CLIP and mT5 models, processes latents through a VAE, and optionally incorporates ControlNet conditioning to guide the output, while handling guidance scaling and safety checking.
business_intent: Enable developers and enterprises to generate highâ€‘quality, multilingual images on demand, with controllable style or structure, for use in creative content, advertising, design, and other visual media applications.
